schools.name: High Mount Elementary School
schools.school-summary: High Mount Elementary School, a public school located in Swansea, IL, serves grades PK-8 in the High Mount School District 116.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 4 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
schools.rating-description: The GreatSchools Rating helps parents compare schools within a state based on a variety of school quality indicators and provides a helpful picture of how effectively each school serves all of its students. Ratings are on a scale of 1 (below average) to 10 (above average) and can include test scores, college readiness, academic progress, advanced courses, equity, discipline and attendance data. We also advise parents to visit schools, consider other information on school performance and programs, and consider family needs as part of the school selection process.

schools.name: Wolf Branch Elementary School
schools.school-summary: Wolf Branch Elementary School, a public school located in Swansea, IL, serves grades PK-4 in the Wolf Branch School District 113.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 6 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.

schools.name: Wolf Branch Middle School
